about_the_game:
The Star Guardian Ekko Skin is included with the CONVERGENCE: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition

Content Includes:
Star Guardian skin and Z-Trail - Shine brighter than any darkness with the Star Guardian Ekko skin. The Star Guardian skin and Z-Trail will be equipable once Elie opens her shop at the beginning of Chapter II.
